Title: Restricts the disclosure of personal information by businesses
Summary: Restricts the disclosure of personal information by businesses; provides that a business that retains a customer's personal information shall make available to the customer free of charge access to, or copies of, all of the customer's personal information retained by the business.
LawCode: Amd Art 39-F Art Head, add ยง899-cc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to restricting the disclosure of personal information by businesses
